document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Flowers, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">heard </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">news </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Dews, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">never </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">deemed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">dripping </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">prize </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Awaited </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">low </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Brows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Bees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">thought </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Summer's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">name </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">rumor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Delirium, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Arctic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Creatures, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">dimly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">stirred </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Tropic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Hint </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Travelled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Bird </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Imported </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Wood </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Wind's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">bright </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">signal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Ear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Making </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">homely, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">severe, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Contented, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">known, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">before </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">unexpected </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Lives </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">thought </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">Worshipping </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">presumptuous </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Psalm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Like flowers that heard the news of dews
